examples: Orobanche myrtilli H.Lév. & É.Labbé in Bull. Acad. Geogr. Bot. 19: 212 (1909).
source: Barnhart. Bull. Acad. Int. Géogr. Bot., 9:209 (1900) and 19: 12 (1909). Dates from Archives départementales de la Mayenne, Journal de la guerre 1914-1918, note about the Labbé pharmacy at Laval via Roland Mogn
